data.title: Xavier University Athletics
data.meta_description: Jacob Lough - HIGH SCHOOL Participated in cross country, track and field and swimming... placed second in the 800-meter run at the Indiana State Championship...
data.text:
HIGH SCHOOL

Participated in cross country, track and field and swimming... placed second in the 800-meter run at the Indiana State Championships in 2018... also won the sectional and regional titles in the 800-meter meter run as a junior... helped the 4x800-meter relay team capture the state title in 2018... was also a member of the 4x400 relay team that placed second at the state championships in 2018.

PERSONAL

Son of Brad and Kimberly Lough... intends to major in graphic design.
